name: Reach For the Surface
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 34. Themes: Growing and Two Button Controls

Make your way out of the hole you are in while using only two button! Collect seeds, grow plants, and climb!

Use F and J to control the character. Hold J to pause. Click the area below the game if the controls don't work at the start.

Head over to the Ludum Dare site to see the others and vote for the best ones! http://ludumdare.com/compo/

My Website: http://samuelcreelman.com/

Build 1.1.1

  • HTML5 build, no more Unity Webplayer.
  • Fixed problems with input.
  • Fixed Bug: Walking on Air.
